text: The Exception is a 2016 romantic war movie directed by David Leveaux and written by Simon Burke. It is based on Alan Judd's 2003 novel The Kaiser's Last Kiss. The movie stars Jai Courtney, Lily James, Janet McTeer, and Christopher Plummer. ==References== Category:2016 romantic drama movies Category:2010s war movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:British war movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American war movies
title: The Exception
